page.title: 15CUSTOMS GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: Several seasonal events have become traditional to the area.{New Year's {Eve}is celebrated in the Cricket Club, people providing their own food and entertainment.{ At{Harvest}children bring their gifts to church and then, after the service, take them to elderly people.After the Evening Service everyone enjoys a hot supper in the Cricket Club. The{Nativity Play}held in church has become a tradition together with the service of Blessing the Crib, that takes place on{Christmas Eve. This year we held our{May Day.}Our queen was crowned,the school children gave a display of{Morris dancing}and we had exciting{side shows. { 1985}was the Golden Jubilee{W.I.}A Flower Festival was held in church and Victorian Fayre at Goldsborough Hall.
